Posts.Content: GWEN1965 wrote: HI ALL, MY 1ST TIME ON THE FORUM. 2YEARS AGO DIAGNOSED W/ NONINVASIVE DUCTAL CARCINOMA IN SITU. HAD 3 LUMPECTOMIES, NO CLEAR MARGINS, AFTER 2ND AND 3RD OPINION HAD MASTECTOMY OF LEFT BREAST ALONG W/TRAM FLAP RECONSTRUCTION FOLLOWD BY CHEMO.  ALL WAS WONDERFUL  HAVE A 4 YEAR OLD WAS READY TO GO ON VACATION THIS MONTH AND "BAM" LAST WEEK I WAS DIAGNOSED W/ INVASIVE DUCTAL CARCINOMA ON THE SAME FREAKIN SIDE OF THE RECONSTRUCTED BREAST. THEY ARE GONNA DO SURGERY ON ME TO REMOVE THE CANCER AND THEN RECONSTRUCT BY DOING A LATISSIMUS DORSI FLAP(BACK MUSCLE) THEY ARE SAYING RADIATION AFTER.   I AM LOOKING FOR ANY ONE WITH SMILIAR EXPERIENCES OR ANY INPUT, IM SCARED AND AM PRETTY SURE I SHOULD BE GETTING 2ND AND 3RD OPINIONS AS FAR AS WHAT DO DO AND TREATMENT. LIKE WHY, WHY WHY DID IT COME BACK. ANY INPUT WOULD BE GREATLY APRRECIATED. HELPPPPPPPP GWEN  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: RE-OCCURENCE HELPPPPPP GWEN1965 VBG
